TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed NSKeyValueObservingOptions extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration of values specifying options to be used with the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.Foundation.NSKeyValueObservingOptions Initial = unsigned int64(4)

Docs.summary: Use this to send a notification on first use, without waiting for an actual change to take place.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.Foundation.NSKeyValueObservingOptions New = unsigned int64(1)

Docs.summary: Request that new values be delivered to the observer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.Foundation.NSKeyValueObservingOptions Old = unsigned int64(2)

Docs.summary: Requests that old values be delivered to the observer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.Foundation.NSKeyValueObservingOptions OldNew = unsigned int64(3)

Docs.summary: Requests that both old and new values be delivered to the observer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.Foundation.NSKeyValueObservingOptions Prior = unsigned int64(8)

Docs.summary: If set, notifications are sent before and after the change to the property is made. Otherwise the notifications are only sent after the property has been set.
